comments:
When the cursor is at the end of key sequence name field, the backspace will delete the last entry. If name is hi-lighted, pressing Backspace does not delete.

STEPS:
Open the Preference page
Select General->Keys
Select an entry (eg. Copy)
Press the Edit button to switch to the Modify tab
In the Key Sequence area, hi-light the name and press Backspace

Result: Nothing happens
Expected: Key sequence to be deleted

It results in an exception:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: All triggers in a trigger sequence must be an instance of Trigger
